thread.section_title: Oakfurnitureland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oakfurnitureland | oakfurnitureland.com | 5 of 8
thread.title: Kath

author: Kath
title: Kath
text: The furniture is really nice. All wood. Packaged really well. They email and call to let you know when they are coming and to set up a time that works for you. And if they notice there is a problem THEY will call YOU. They noticed I ordered the same thing twice by mistake and right away realized I goofed when ordering and they called me right up and corrected it immediately. They do have an "English" accent but it is very understandable and pleasant to listen to. And the prices are VERY reasonable.
